sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade' import { ADD_STUDENT } from './../../../../action/types'; class ContactInformation extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { address: "", unit: "", city: "", state: "", zipcode: "", } } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } componentDidMount() { axios.get("http://localhost:8080/getStates").then(response => { const temp = response.data.map(st => { return }) this.setState({ states: temp }) }) } render() { return (
this.onChange} name="address" value={this.state.address} className="form-control" id="inputAddress" placeholder="1234 Main St" />
this.onChange} name="unit" value={this.state.unit} className="form-control" id="inputAddress2" placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor" />
this.onChange} name="city" value={this.state.city} className="form-control" id="inputCity" />
this.onChange} name="zipcode" value={this.state.zipcode} className="form-control" id="inputZip" />
this.onChange} name="address" value={this.state.address} className="form-control" id="inputAddress" placeholder="1234 Main St" />
); } } export default ContactInformation;
